column5: Hey,  So my buddy sent me a msg and asked me if you are allowed to ice fish at grenadier pond....I don't have a regs on me as I am accessing the internet via blackberry, so looking it up is tough right now...  Does anybody know if you are able to? He said he saw some people ice fishing it, and I had never really though about it nore have I looked into it before?
you're not allowed to skate on it i don't think, so i doubt you'd be able to fish it. give the mnr a call and let us know!
We use to skate on it all the time???

There used to always be icefishing and skating on Grenadier's, and you could also skate on the duck ponds. Of course, that was back in the 70's, before every mother's son was looking for the flimsiest excuse to start a lawsuit.
Stick to the farr side and wear earthy colours..  Be kind and let the crappies go!!  HD
